"Killing the mind and killing the heart?
The moon falls in the deep autumn water of Cold Lake.
He had to pull a golden boar and swallow a fish.
It's a pity that there are few soulmates in the face of the gandharva.
(Green Raining Plantain) Zhaozhou was on his way to the park with a government official.
When he saw a rabbit, it was scared away.
The official asked.
"The monk is a great teacher of goodness.
Why did the rabbit run away when he saw it?
The master said, "The old monk is a good killer.
That yakṣa or rāṣa is venomous and mean-spirited.
The flowery peak is as steep as the ocean is deep.
He's already presented his sword blade to someone.
It's too late to go back past the black cloud cave.

source_sentence: (綠雨蕉)趙州問南泉如何是異類中行。
translation: (Green Raining Plantain) Zhaozhou asked Nanquan how he was walking among different kinds of people.
Quan pushed his hand to the ground and made a donkey cry.
The teacher then gave him a smack.
He returned to the hall and asked him to repent.
Quan asked his attendant to ask what repentance was.
The teacher said he regretted not giving two more blows.
Tianjing Xingyun.
Nanquan owed Zhaozhou one stroke.
Zhaozhou owed Nanquan one move, and Zhaozhou lost Nanquan one opportunity.
How was it produced?
Thousands of years of old paper is good for combining medicines.
It's merited to rid the country of three parts.
It's called the eight hexagrams.
The rivers flow and the rocks don't turn.
He left behind a grudge that was lost in the swallowing of Wu.
(And [yak*out] ne)
"The Han emperor toiled arduously in dry warfare.
The emperor's business prospered, and there were many outstanding men.
He still hates the fact that there are no strong men in the four directions.
He returned to his hometown and sang the song of the great wind.
(Jueyuan Yin) Zongjian falin vol. 17
